Naâma Province , sub-prefecture of Ain Sefra , pre-Saharan oasis of Tiout , wadi Rouiba (permanent wadi) situated along the road leading to Ain-Sefra at the site of rock engravings Tiout , plankton sample.

Record numbers. Algeria : 1, Kenya : 13, Morocco : 2, Tanzania : 3; total: 19.

Remarks. All
Dactylobiotus
species require careful analysis of adults and eggs (e.g. Kaczmarek et al. 2012b). Records of this this largely Holarctic species ( McInnes 1994 ), implies the African records need re-assessment.
